companies.position: Salesforce Commerce Cloud Full Stack Developer
Senior Salesforce Commerce Cloud Full Stack Developer

projects.general_information: Sephora is a global beauty retailer founded in 1969 in France, offering a wide range of cosmetics, skincare, fragrance, and beauty tools. Known for its diverse product selection from high-end and niche brands, Sephora provides a one-stop shopping experience for beauty enthusiasts. The company is recognized for its immersive shopping experience, offering personalized beauty consultations, a wide variety of samples, and a loyalty program. Sephora operates stores in numerous countries worldwide and has a strong online presence, making beauty products accessible to a global audience.
responsibilities: Developed custom SLAS/SCAPI hooks for Salesforce Commerce Cloud API to extend functionality and meet specific business needs.
Updated existing hooks for Product Detail Page (PDP), Product Listing Page (PLP), and Search to ensure accurate and consistent data delivery.
Created and managed jobs for import/export processes, ensuring smooth and timely updates for catalog and product data.
Configured and managed Business Manager database, optimizing data management processes and ensuring efficient system operations.

projects.general_information: Floris van Bommel is a premium Dutch footwear brand known for its high-quality craftsmanship, innovative designs, and stylish yet comfortable shoes. The brand is particularly recognized for its unique patterns, bold colors, and high-quality materials, making it a standout in luxury footwear.

Mizuno is particularly recognized for its advanced technology in footwear, offering performance-driven designs that emphasize comfort, durability, and innovation. Its products are favored for their durability, sophistication, and timeless appeal, making it a staple in the world of luxury fashion.

projects.general_information: Whittard of Chelsea is a British retailer specializing in premium tea, coffee, hot chocolate, and related accessories. Whittard also offers a variety of teapots, mugs, and gift sets, emphasizing craftsmanship and tradition. The company is renowned for its commitment to sourcing the finest ingredients and creating unique, flavorful products for tea and coffee enthusiasts around the world.

projects.general_information: Moleskine is an Italian brand renowned for its high-quality notebooks, journals, and stationery products. The brand offers a variety of notebooks, planners, and accessories, all designed to inspire creativity and organization. Moleskine products are favored by writers, artists, professionals, and travelers for their sleek design, durable materials, and functional layout.

projects.general_information: Baccarat is a luxury French brand established in 1764, renowned for its high-quality crystal glassware, decorative items, and jewelry. The brand is synonymous with sophistication, luxury, and timeless beauty, offering premium products that are highly sought after by collectors and connoisseurs.

projects.general_information: Etnia Barcelona is a Spanish eyewear brand founded in 2001 by David Pellicer. The company draws inspiration from Barcelona's vibrant culture, offering a diverse range of sunglasses and optical frames that blend vintage aesthetics with contemporary design. Etnia Barcelona collaborates with renowned artists and institutions, resulting in unique collections that celebrate art and creativity. Their products are crafted with high-quality materials, including mineral glass lenses and natural acetate, ensuring durability and comfort. The brand also emphasizes sustainability, working towards eco-friendly packaging and production processes. Etnia Barcelona's eyewear is available worldwide, with flagship stores in Barcelona and a strong online presence.
